code.code:
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    mcr.ratio_name,
    fr.data
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mcr ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
    AND mcr.ratio_name IN ('Return On Equity', 'Return On Assets')
    AND ((fr.year = 2020 AND fr.quarter != 0) OR
         (fr.year = 2021 AND fr.quarter != 0) OR
         (fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter != 0) OR
         (fr.year = 2023 AND fr.quarter != 0) OR
         (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter IN (1, 2)))
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter, mcr.ratio_name;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  fr.ratio_code,
  fr.stock_code,
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  fr.data
FROM financial_ratio AS fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
  ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE
  (
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity' OR mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Assets'
  )
  AND fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
  AND fr.year >= 2020
ORDER BY
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: What is the trend of the Return on Equity (ROE) for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB from 2020 to Q2 2024?

code.code:
SELECT 
    stock_code, 
    year, 
    quarter, 
    data AS roe
FROM 
    financial_ratio
WHERE 
    ratio_code = 'ROE'
    AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND (
        (year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) -- Annual data from 2020 to 2023
        OR (year = 2024 AND quarter BETWEEN 1 AND 2) -- Quarterly data for Q1 and Q2 of 2024
    )
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, 
    year, 
    quarter;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  fr.data AS roe
FROM financial_ratio AS fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
  ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
JOIN company_info AS ci
  ON fr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
WHERE
  mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
  AND ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
  AND fr.year >= 2020
ORDER BY
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter;

question: What was the current ratio for Vietcombank and Techcombank in 2022?

code.code:
SELECT stock_code, data
FROM financial_ratio
WHERE ratio_code = 'CurrentR'
  AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB')
  AND year = 2022
  AND quarter = 0;

code_response.code:
WITH current_assets_vcb AS (
  SELECT
    data AS current_assets
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code = 'VCB' AND year = 2022 AND quarter = 0
    AND category_code IN (
      SELECT
        category_code
      FROM map_category_code_bank
      WHERE
        en_caption LIKE '%current assets%'
    )
), current_liabilities_vcb AS (
  SELECT
    data AS current_liabilities
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code = 'VCB' AND year = 2022 AND quarter = 0
    AND category_code IN (
      SELECT
        category_code
      FROM map_category_code_bank
      WHERE
        en_caption LIKE '%current liabilities%'
    )
), current_assets_tcb AS (
  SELECT
    data AS current_assets
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code = 'TCB' AND year = 2022 AND quarter = 0
    AND category_code IN (
      SELECT
        category_code
      FROM map_category_code_bank
      WHERE
        en_caption LIKE '%current assets%'
    )
), current_liabilities_tcb AS (
  SELECT
    data AS current_liabilities
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code = 'TCB' AND year = 2022 AND quarter = 0
    AND category_code IN (
      SELECT
        category_code
      FROM map_category_code_bank
      WHERE
        en_caption LIKE '%current liabilities%'
    )
)
SELECT
  'VCB' AS stock_code,
  (
    SELECT
      current_assets
    FROM current_assets_vcb
  ) / (
    SELECT
      current_liabilities
    FROM current_liabilities_vcb
  ) AS current_ratio
FROM current_assets_vcb
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'TCB' AS stock_code,
  (
    SELECT
      current_assets
    FROM current_assets_tcb
  ) / (
    SELECT
      current_liabilities
    FROM current_liabilities_tcb
  ) AS current_ratio
FROM current_assets_tcb;

SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    mccr.ratio_name,
    fr.data
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
    AND mccr.ratio_code IN ('NPM', 'CurrentR')
    AND (
        (fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR
        (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter = 2)
    )
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code, 
    fr.year, 
    fr.quarter, 
    mccr.ratio_name;

SELECT
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  CASE
    WHEN fr.stock_code = 'VNM' THEN 'Vinamilk'
    WHEN fr.stock_code = 'MSN' THEN 'Masan Group'
  END AS company_name,
  fr.data AS ratio_value
FROM financial_ratio AS fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
  ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE
  (
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Net profit margin' OR mcr.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio'
  )
  AND fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
  AND fr.year >= 2020
  AND (
    fr.quarter = 0 OR fr.quarter <= 2
  )
ORDER BY
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  company_name;

code.code:
-- Query to get accounts receivable and inventory values for the specified companies
SELECT 
    nbfr.stock_code,
    mccnb.en_caption AS category,
    nbfr.data AS value
FROM 
    non_bank_financial_report nbfr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_non_bank mccnb ON nbfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
WHERE 
    nbfr.stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'MSN')
    AND nbfr.year = 2021
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND nbfr.category_code IN ('BS_131', 'BS_141')

UNION ALL

-- Query to get investment details for the specified companies
SELECT 
    s.stock_code,
    CASE 
        WHEN nbfr.category_code = 'BS_251' THEN 'Investment in subsidiaries'
        WHEN nbfr.category_code = 'BS_252' THEN 'Investment in associates and joint ventures'
    END AS category,
    nbfr.data AS value
FROM 
    non_bank_financial_report nbfr
JOIN 
    sub_and_shareholder s ON nbfr.stock_code = s.stock_code
WHERE 
    nbfr.stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'MSN')
    AND nbfr.year = 2021
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND nbfr.category_code IN ('BS_251', 'BS_252');

SELECT

question: Compare the Net Income, Total Assets, and Total Liabilities of Vinamilk and Masan Group for the fiscal year 2023.  Calculate the Debt-to-Equity ratio for both companies.

code.code:
WITH financial_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'IS_030' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS net_income,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_270' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_assets,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_300' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_liabilities
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN') AND
        year = 2023 AND
        quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code
)
SELECT 
    fd.stock_code,
    fd.net_income,
    fd.total_assets,
    fd.total_liabilities,
    (fd.total_liabilities / (fd.total_assets - fd.total_liabilities)) AS debt_to_equity_ratio
FROM 
    financial_data fd;

code_response.code:
WITH company_data AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    nbfr.data AS net_income,
    bs_total_assets.data AS total_assets,
    bs_total_liabilities.data AS total_liabilities
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
    ON ci.stock_code = nbfr.stock_code
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb
    ON nbfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
  LEFT JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS bs_total_assets
    ON ci.stock_code = bs_total_assets.stock_code
    AND bs_total_assets.category_code = 'BS_100' -- Assuming BS_100 represents Total Assets
    AND bs_total_assets.year = 2023
    AND bs_total_assets.quarter = 0
  LEFT JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS bs_total_liabilities
    ON ci.stock_code = bs_total_liabilities.stock_code
    AND bs_total_liabilities.category_code = 'BS_110' -- Assuming BS_110 represents Total Liabilities
    AND bs_total_liabilities.year = 2023
    AND bs_total_liabilities.quarter = 0
  WHERE
    mccnb.en_caption = 'Net Income'
    AND nbfr.year = 2023
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
), debt_to_equity AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.data AS debt_to_equity_ratio
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
    AND fr.year = 2023
    AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
)
SELECT
  cd.stock_code,
  cd.en_company_name,
  cd.net_income,
  cd.total_assets,
  cd.total_liabilities,
  de.debt_to_equity_ratio
FROM company_data AS cd
JOIN debt_to_equity AS de
  ON cd.stock_code = de.stock_code
LIMIT 2;

question: What were the total current assets and current liabilities for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and VPBank in 2022, and what were their respective current ratios for that year?  Further, provide the details of their significant subsidiaries' contribution to these figures.

code.code:
-- Step 1: Retrieve total current assets and current liabilities for the specified banks
WITH bank_assets_liabilities AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_100' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_current_assets,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_310' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_current_liabilities
    FROM 
        bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND year = 2022
        AND quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code
),

-- Step 2: Retrieve current ratio for the specified banks
bank_current_ratios AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        data AS current_ratio
    FROM 
        financial_ratio
    WHERE 
        ratio_code = 'CurrentR'
        AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND year = 2022
        AND quarter = 0
),

-- Step 3: Retrieve subsidiaries' contributions
subsidiaries_contributions AS (
    SELECT 
        s.stock_code,
        s.invest_on,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.category_code = 'BS_100' THEN f.data ELSE 0 END) AS subsidiary_current_assets,
        SUM(CASE WHEN f.category_code = 'BS_310' THEN f.data ELSE 0 END) AS subsidiary_current_liabilities
    FROM 
        sub_and_shareholder s
    JOIN 
        bank_financial_report f ON s.invest_on = f.stock_code
    WHERE 
        s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
        AND f.year = 2022
        AND f.quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        s.stock_code, s.invest_on
)

-- Final output combining all the information
SELECT 
    a.stock_code,
    a.total_current_assets,
    a.total_current_liabilities,
    r.current_ratio,
    sc.invest_on AS subsidiary_stock_code,
    sc.subsidiary_current_assets,
    sc.subsidiary_current_liabilities
FROM 
    bank_assets_liabilities a
JOIN 
    bank_current_ratios r ON a.stock_code = r.stock_code
LEFT JOIN 
    subsidiaries_contributions sc ON a.stock_code = sc.stock_code
ORDER BY 
    a.stock_code, sc.invest_on;

code_response.code:
WITH CompanyAssetsLiabilities AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'BS_100' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS current_assets,
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'BS_310' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS current_liabilities
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN bank_financial_report AS bfr
    ON ci.stock_code = bfr.stock_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    AND bfr.year = 2022
    AND bfr.quarter = 0
  GROUP BY
    ci.stock_code
), CompanyRatios AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.data AS current_ratio
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio'
    AND fr.year = 2022
    AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
)
SELECT
  cal.stock_code,
  cal.current_assets,
  cal.current_liabilities,
  cr.current_ratio
FROM CompanyAssetsLiabilities AS cal
JOIN CompanyRatios AS cr
  ON cal.stock_code = cr.stock_code;

question: What was the average Return on Equity (ROE) for  Vietcombank, Techcombank, and  VPBank  in 2022, and how did this compare to their respective subsidiaries' average ROE for the same year?

code.code:
WITH bank_roe AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code, 
        AVG(data) AS avg_roe
    FROM 
        financial_ratio
    WHERE 
        ratio_code = 'ROE' 
        AND year = 2022 
        AND quarter = 0
        AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code
),
subsidiary_roe AS (
    SELECT 
        s.stock_code, 
        AVG(fr.data) AS avg_roe
    FROM 
        sub_and_shareholder s
    JOIN 
        financial_ratio fr ON s.invest_on = fr.stock_code
    WHERE 
        fr.ratio_code = 'ROE' 
        AND fr.year = 2022 
        AND fr.quarter = 0
        AND s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
    GROUP BY 
        s.stock_code
)
SELECT 
    b.stock_code AS bank,
    b.avg_roe AS bank_avg_roe,
    s.avg_roe AS subsidiary_avg_roe
FROM 
    bank_roe b
LEFT JOIN 
    subsidiary_roe s ON b.stock_code = s.stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH ParentROE AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    AVG(fr.data) AS avg_roe
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN financial_ratio AS fr
    ON ci.stock_code = fr.stock_code
  WHERE
    fr.ratio_code = 'ROE' AND fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
  GROUP BY
    ci.stock_code
), SubsidiaryROE AS (
  SELECT
    p.stock_code AS parent_stock_code,
    AVG(fr.data) AS avg_subsidiary_roe
  FROM sub_and_shareholder AS s
  JOIN company_info AS p
    ON s.stock_code = p.stock_code
  JOIN company_info AS sub
    ON s.invest_on = sub.stock_code
  JOIN financial_ratio AS fr
    ON sub.stock_code = fr.stock_code
  WHERE
    fr.ratio_code = 'ROE' AND fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND p.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
  GROUP BY
    p.stock_code
)
SELECT
  p.stock_code,
  p.avg_roe,
  COALESCE(s.avg_subsidiary_roe, 0) AS avg_subsidiary_roe
FROM ParentROE AS p
LEFT JOIN SubsidiaryROE AS s
  ON p.stock_code = s.parent_stock_code
LIMIT 100;

| VNM          | DTER         | 0.503847 |
| MSN          | CurrentR     | 0.874439 |
| VNM          | CurrentR     | 2.1016   |

code.code:
SELECT 
    stock_code, 
    ratio_code, 
    data 
FROM 
    financial_ratio 
WHERE 
    (stock_code = 'VNM' OR stock_code = 'MSN') 
    AND year = 2023 
    AND quarter = 0 
    AND (ratio_code = 'DTER' OR ratio_code = 'CurrentR');

code_response.code:
SELECT
  r1.data AS "Debt-to-Equity Ratio_VNM",
  r2.data AS "Current Ratio_VNM",
  r3.data AS "Debt-to-Equity Ratio_MSN",
  r4.data AS "Current Ratio_MSN"
FROM financial_ratio AS r1
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS m1
  ON r1.ratio_code = m1.ratio_code
JOIN company_info AS c1
  ON r1.stock_code = c1.stock_code
JOIN financial_ratio AS r2
  ON r1.stock_code = r2.stock_code AND r1.year = r2.year AND r1.quarter = r2.quarter
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS m2
  ON r2.ratio_code = m2.ratio_code
JOIN financial_ratio AS r3
  ON r1.year = r3.year AND r1.quarter = r3.quarter
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS m3
  ON r3.ratio_code = m3.ratio_code
JOIN company_info AS c2
  ON r3.stock_code = c2.stock_code
JOIN financial_ratio AS r4
  ON r3.year = r4.year AND r3.quarter = r4.quarter
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS m4
  ON r4.ratio_code = m4.ratio_code
JOIN company_info AS c3
  ON r4.stock_code = c3.stock_code
WHERE
  m1.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
  AND m2.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio'
  AND m3.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
  AND m4.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio'
  AND c1.stock_code = 'VNM'
  AND c2.stock_code = 'VNM'
  AND c3.stock_code = 'MSN'
  AND r1.year = 2023
  AND r1.quarter = 0
LIMIT 1;

question: Compare the changes in  Property, Plant, and Equipment (PP&E)  for Vinamilk, Hoa Phat Group, and VinGroup from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Show the net increase/decrease each year.

code.code:
WITH ppe_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        SUM(data) AS total_ppe
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        category_code IN ('BS_220', 'BS_221', 'BS_224', 'BS_227', 'BS_263')
        AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'HPG', 'VIC')
        AND ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
),
ppe_change AS (
    SELECT 
        a.stock_code,
        a.year,
        a.total_ppe - COALESCE(b.total_ppe, 0) AS net_change
    FROM 
        ppe_data a
    LEFT JOIN 
        ppe_data b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code AND a.year = b.year + 1
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    net_change
FROM 
    ppe_change
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, year;

code_response.code:
WITH PPECategory AS (
  SELECT
    category_code
  FROM map_category_code_non_bank
  WHERE
    en_caption LIKE '%Property, Plant, and Equipment%'
), YearlyPPE AS (
  SELECT
    nbfr.year,
    nbfr.data,
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name
  FROM non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
  JOIN PPECategory
    ON nbfr.category_code = PPECategory.category_code
  JOIN company_info AS ci
    ON nbfr.stock_code = ci.stock_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'HPG', 'VIC')
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
)
SELECT
  y.year,
  y.en_company_name,
  y.data - LAG(y.data, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY y.en_company_name ORDER BY y.year) AS net_change
FROM YearlyPPE AS y
WHERE
  y.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
ORDER BY
  y.en_company_name,
  y.year;

question: What is the trend of the Current Ratio for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB from 2020 to Q2 2024?

code.code:
SELECT 
    stock_code, 
    year, 
    quarter, 
    data AS current_ratio
FROM 
    financial_ratio
WHERE 
    ratio_code = 'CurrentR' 
    AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND (
        (year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND quarter = 0) -- Annual data for 2020 to 2023
        OR 
        (year = 2024 AND quarter <= 2) -- Quarterly data for 2024 up to Q2
    )
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, 
    year, 
    quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH CurrentAssets AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(data) AS current_assets
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    category_code IN ('BS_100', 'BS_150', 'BS_155')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), CurrentLiabilities AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(data) AS current_liabilities
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    category_code IN ('BS_310')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
)
SELECT
  ca.stock_code,
  ca.year,
  ca.quarter,
  (
    ca.current_assets / cl.current_liabilities
  ) AS current_ratio
FROM CurrentAssets ca
JOIN CurrentLiabilities cl
  ON ca.stock_code = cl.stock_code
  AND ca.year = cl.year
  AND ca.quarter = cl.quarter
WHERE
  ca.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
  AND ca.year >= 2020
ORDER BY
  ca.year,
  ca.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: Show the change in  total assets and total liabilities for Vinamilk, Masan Group, and Hoa Phat Group from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Calculate the debt-to-asset ratio for each company for each year.

code.code:
WITH AssetLiabilityData AS (
    SELECT
        nfr.stock_code,
        nfr.year,
        nfr.quarter,
        CASE
            WHEN mccnb.en_caption = 'TOTAL ASSETS' THEN nfr.data
            ELSE 0
        END AS total_assets,
        CASE
            WHEN mccnb.en_caption = 'TOTAL LIABILITIES AND EQUITY' THEN nfr.data
            ELSE 0
        END AS total_liabilities
    FROM
        non_bank_financial_report nfr
    JOIN
        map_category_code_non_bank mccnb ON nfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
    WHERE
        nfr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG')
        AND mccnb.en_caption IN ('TOTAL ASSETS', 'TOTAL LIABILITIES AND EQUITY')
        AND ((nfr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND nfr.quarter = 0) OR (nfr.year = 2024 AND nfr.quarter = 2))
),
AggregatedData AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        SUM(total_assets) AS total_assets,
        SUM(total_liabilities) AS total_liabilities
    FROM
        AssetLiabilityData
    GROUP BY
        stock_code, year, quarter
)
SELECT
    ad.stock_code,
    ad.year,
    ad.quarter,
    ad.total_assets,
    ad.total_liabilities,
    fr.data AS debt_to_asset_ratio
FROM
    AggregatedData ad
LEFT JOIN
    financial_ratio fr ON ad.stock_code = fr.stock_code AND ad.year = fr.year AND ad.quarter = fr.quarter
WHERE
    fr.ratio_code = 'DTAR'
ORDER BY
    ad.stock_code, ad.year, ad.quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH CompanyData AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    nfr.year,
    nfr.quarter,
    SUM(CASE WHEN nfr.category_code = 'BS_100' THEN nfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS total_assets,
    SUM(CASE WHEN nfr.category_code = 'BS_200' THEN nfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS total_liabilities
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS nfr
    ON ci.stock_code = nfr.stock_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'HPG')
    AND nfr.year >= 2020
    AND (
      nfr.quarter = 0
      OR nfr.quarter = 2
    )
  GROUP BY
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    nfr.year,
    nfr.quarter
), YearlyData AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    en_company_name,
    year,
    MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 0 THEN total_assets ELSE NULL END) AS annual_total_assets,
    MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 0 THEN total_liabilities ELSE NULL END) AS annual_total_liabilities,
    MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 2 THEN total_assets ELSE NULL END) AS q2_total_assets,
    MAX(CASE WHEN quarter = 2 THEN total_liabilities ELSE NULL END) AS q2_total_liabilities
  FROM CompanyData
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    en_company_name,
    year
), RatioData AS (
  SELECT
    yd.stock_code,
    yd.en_company_name,
    yd.year,
    (
      yd.annual_total_liabilities::numeric / yd.annual_total_assets::numeric
    ) AS annual_debt_to_asset_ratio
  FROM YearlyData AS yd
)
SELECT
  rd.stock_code,
  rd.en_company_name,
  rd.year,
  rd.annual_debt_to_asset_ratio,
  yd.annual_total_assets,
  yd.annual_total_liabilities,
  yd.q2_total_assets,
  yd.q2_total_liabilities
FROM RatioData AS rd
JOIN YearlyData AS yd
  ON rd.stock_code = yd.stock_code
  AND rd.year = yd.year
ORDER BY
  rd.stock_code,
  rd.year
LIMIT 100;

question: What is the trend of the Cash Flow from Operating Activities to Total Assets ratio for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB from 2020 to Q2 2024?

code.code:
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code, 
    fr.year, 
    fr.quarter, 
    fr.data AS cash_flow_to_total_assets_ratio
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Cash Flow from Operating Activities to Total Assets'
    AND ((fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) AND (fr.quarter = 0 OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter <= 2)))
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code, 
    fr.year, 
    fr.quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH CFOA AS (
  SELECT
    year,
    quarter,
    data AS CFOA
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND category_code = 'CF_009'
), TotalAssets AS (
  SELECT
    year,
    quarter,
    data AS TotalAssets
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND category_code = 'BS_300'
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(CFOA.year, TotalAssets.year) AS year,
  COALESCE(CFOA.quarter, TotalAssets.quarter) AS quarter,
  CFOA.CFOA / TotalAssets.TotalAssets AS ratio,
  CFOA.stock_code
FROM CFOA
JOIN TotalAssets
  ON CFOA.stock_code = TotalAssets.stock_code
  AND CFOA.year = TotalAssets.year
  AND CFOA.quarter = TotalAssets.quarter
WHERE
  COALESCE(CFOA.year, TotalAssets.year) >= 2020
  AND COALESCE(CFOA.quarter, TotalAssets.quarter) <= 2
ORDER BY
  year,
  quarter,
  stock_code
LIMIT 100;

question: Compare the change in the Free Cash Flow (FCF) to Revenue ratio for Vinamilk, Masan Group, and SABECO from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Calculate FCF as Operating Cash Flow - Capital Expenditures.

code.code:
WITH fcf_calculation AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        quarter,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_020' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS operating_cash_flow,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_021' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS capital_expenditures,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'IS_030' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS revenue
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB') AND
        ((year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024) AND (quarter = 0 OR quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year, quarter
)
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    (operating_cash_flow - capital_expenditures) AS free_cash_flow,
    revenue,
    CASE 
        WHEN revenue != 0 THEN (operating_cash_flow - capital_expenditures) / revenue
        ELSE NULL
    END AS fcf_to_revenue_ratio
FROM 
    fcf_calculation
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, year, quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH OperatingCashFlow AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_001' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS operating_cash_flow
  FROM non_bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), CapitalExpenditure AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'CF_002' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS capital_expenditure
  FROM non_bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), Revenue AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'IS_001' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS revenue
  FROM non_bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), FCF AS (
  SELECT
    ocf.stock_code,
    ocf.year,
    ocf.quarter,
    ocf.operating_cash_flow - ce.capital_expenditure AS fcf
  FROM OperatingCashFlow AS ocf
  JOIN CapitalExpenditure AS ce
    ON ocf.stock_code = ce.stock_code
    AND ocf.year = ce.year
    AND ocf.quarter = ce.quarter
)
SELECT
  fcf.stock_code,
  fcf.year,
  fcf.quarter,
  fcf.fcf,
  rev.revenue,
  fcf.fcf / rev.revenue AS fcf_to_revenue_ratio
FROM FCF AS fcf
JOIN Revenue AS rev
  ON fcf.stock_code = rev.stock_code
  AND fcf.year = rev.year
  AND fcf.quarter = rev.quarter
WHERE
  fcf.year >= 2020
ORDER BY
  fcf.stock_code,
  fcf.year,
  fcf.quarter
LIMIT 100;

-- Step 1: Retrieve Current Ratio and Quick Ratio
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    mccr.ratio_name,
    fr.data AS ratio_value
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND mccr.ratio_name IN ('Current Ratio', 'Quick Ratio')
    AND ((fr.year = 2020 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2021 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2022 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2023 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter IN (1, 2)));

-- Step 2: Analyze changes in cash and short-term investments
SELECT 
    nbf.stock_code,
    nbf.year,
    nbf.quarter,
    mccnb.en_caption,
    nbf.data AS financial_data
FROM 
    non_bank_financial_report nbf
JOIN 
    map_category_code_non_bank mccnb ON nbf.category_code = mccnb.category_code
WHERE 
    nbf.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND mccnb.en_caption IN ('I. Cash and cash equivalents', 'II. Short-term financial investments')
    AND ((nbf.year = 2020 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2021 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2022 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2023 AND nbf.quarter = 0) OR 
         (nbf.year = 2024 AND nbf.quarter IN (1, 2)));

code_response.code:
SELECT
  ci.stock_code,
  ci.en_company_name,
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fr.ratio_code = 'CurrentR' THEN fr.data ELSE NULL END) AS current_ratio,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fr.ratio_code = 'QR' THEN fr.data ELSE NULL END) AS quick_ratio,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fr.ratio_code = 'CashR' THEN fr.data ELSE NULL END) AS cash_ratio
FROM company_info AS ci
JOIN financial_ratio AS fr
  ON ci.stock_code = fr.stock_code
WHERE
  ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB') AND fr.year >= 2020 AND fr.year <= 2024
GROUP BY
  ci.stock_code,
  ci.en_company_name,
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter
ORDER BY
  ci.stock_code,
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter;

  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    quarter = 2
    AND year = 2024
    AND category_code = 'CF_045'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM non_bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    quarter = 2
    AND year = 2024
    AND category_code = 'BS_110'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM securities_financial_report
  WHERE
    quarter = 2
    AND year = 2024
    AND category_code = 'CF_103'
)
SELECT
  stock_code,
  SUM(data) AS total_cash_equivalents
FROM CashEquivalents
GROUP BY
  stock_code
ORDER BY
  total_cash_equivalents DESC
LIMIT 10;

question: Compare the Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC) of Vinamilk and Masan Group in 2023 Q2.  Calculate CCC using the average inventory, accounts receivable, and accounts payable.

code.code:
WITH Inventory AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS inventory
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code IN ('BS_140', 'BS_141')
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
),
Receivables AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS receivables
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code = 'BS_131'
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
),
Payables AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS payables
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE year = 2023 AND quarter = 2 AND category_code = 'BS_311'
      AND stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
)
SELECT 
    i.stock_code,
    i.inventory,
    r.receivables,
    p.payables,
    -- Assuming some constants for days in period and cost of goods sold for calculation
    (i.inventory / 365) AS DIO, 
    (r.receivables / 365) AS DSO,
    (p.payables / 365) AS DPO,
    ((i.inventory / 365) + (r.receivables / 365) - (p.payables / 365)) AS CCC
FROM Inventory i
JOIN Receivables r ON i.stock_code = r.stock_code
JOIN Payables p ON i.stock_code = p.stock_code;

SELECT 
    fr.stock_code, 
    ci.industry, 
    fr.year, 
    fr.data AS roe
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN

WITH annual_roe AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.data AS roe
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity' AND fr.quarter = 0
    AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
), ranked_roe AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    roe,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY year ORDER BY roe DESC) AS rank
  FROM annual_roe
)
SELECT
  rr.stock_code,
  rr.year,
  rr.roe
FROM ranked_roe AS rr
WHERE
  rr.rank <= 5
ORDER BY
  rr.year,
  rr.rank
LIMIT 5;

WITH DebtEquity AS (
  SELECT 
    f.stock_code,
    f.data as debt,
    e.data as equity
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_400' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
  ) f
  JOIN (
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_400' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_500' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      stock_code,
      data
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_400' and quarter = 4 and year = 2023
  ) e ON f.stock_code = e.stock_code
),
Ratio AS (
  SELECT 
    stock_code,
    debt/equity as dter
  FROM DebtEquity
)
SELECT 
  stock_code,
  dter
FROM Ratio
ORDER BY 
  dter ASC
LIMIT 10;

question: For the first half of 2024, what were the total assets and total liabilities of Vinamilk and Mobile World Investment?

code.code:
SELECT 
    nfr.stock_code,
    nfr.year,
    nfr.quarter,
    mcc.en_caption,
    SUM(nfr.data) AS total_value
FROM 
    non_bank_financial_report nfr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_non_bank mcc ON nfr.category_code = mcc.category_code
WHERE 
    nfr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MWG')
    AND nfr.year = 2024
    AND nfr.quarter IN (1, 2)
    AND mcc.category_code IN ('BS_270', 'BS_300')
GROUP BY 
    nfr.stock_code, nfr.year, nfr.quarter, mcc.en_caption
ORDER BY 
    nfr.stock_code, nfr.year, nfr.quarter, mcc.en_caption;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.stock_code = 'VNM' THEN T2.data ELSE 0 END) AS VNM_Total_Assets_Liabilities,
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.stock_code = 'MWG' THEN T2.data ELSE 0 END) AS MWG_Total_Assets_Liabilities
FROM company_info AS T1
JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS T2
  ON T1.stock_code = T2.stock_code
JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS T3
  ON T2.category_code = T3.category_code
WHERE
  T3.en_caption IN ('Total Assets', 'Total Liabilities')
  AND T2.year = 2024
  AND T2.quarter IN (1, 2)
LIMIT 1;

    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    mccr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity' 
    AND fr.year = 2022 
    AND fr.quarter = 0
ORDER BY 
    roe_value DESC
LIMIT 10;

code.code:
WITH net_income_exceeding AS (
    SELECT
        stock_code,
        SUM(data) AS total_net_income
    FROM (
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'IS_021' AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND quarter != 0

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'IS_400' AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND quarter != 0

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM securities_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'IS_400' AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND quarter != 0
    ) AS combined_reports
    GROUP BY stock_code
    HAVING SUM(data) > 1000000
),
top_companies AS (
    SELECT
        fr.stock_code,
        fr.data AS debt_to_equity_ratio
    FROM financial_ratio fr
    JOIN net_income_exceeding nie ON fr.stock_code = nie.stock_code
    WHERE fr.ratio_code = 'DTER' AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND fr.quarter != 0
    ORDER BY fr.data DESC
    LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.industry,
    ci.is_bank,
    ci.is_securities,
    tc.debt_to_equity_ratio
FROM company_info ci
JOIN top_companies tc ON ci.stock_code = tc.stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH NetIncome AS (
  SELECT
    nr.stock_code,
    nr.year,
    nr.quarter,
    nr.data AS net_income
  FROM non_bank_financial_report AS nr
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS m
    ON nr.category_code = m.category_code
  WHERE
    m.en_caption = 'Net profit from operating activities'
    AND nr.year >= 2020
    AND nr.quarter IN (0, 2)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    br.stock_code,
    br.year,
    br.quarter,
    br.data AS net_income
  FROM bank_financial_report AS br
  JOIN map_category_code_bank AS m
    ON br.category_code = m.category_code
  WHERE
    m.en_caption LIKE '%Net profit%'
    AND br.year >= 2020
    AND br.quarter IN (0, 2)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    sr.stock_code,
    sr.year,
    sr.quarter,
    sr.data AS net_income
  FROM securities_financial_report AS sr
  JOIN map_category_code_securities AS m
    ON sr.category_code = m.category_code
  WHERE
    m.en_caption LIKE '%Total comprehensive income%'
    AND sr.year >= 2020
    AND sr.quarter IN (0, 2)
), DebtToEquity AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    fr.data AS debt_to_equity
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
    AND fr.year >= 2020
    AND fr.quarter IN (0,2)
)
SELECT
  ni.stock_code,
  ni.net_income,
  de.debt_to_equity
FROM NetIncome AS ni
JOIN DebtToEquity AS de
  ON ni.stock_code = de.stock_code
  AND ni.year = de.year
  AND ni.quarter = de.quarter
WHERE
  ni.net_income > 1000
ORDER BY
  de.debt_to_equity
LIMIT 10;

code.code:
WITH total_assets AS (
    SELECT stock_code, MAX(data) AS max_total_assets
    FROM (
        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024

        UNION ALL

        SELECT stock_code, data
        FROM securities_financial_report
        WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    ) AS combined_assets
    GROUP BY stock_code
    HAVING MAX(data) > 100000000
),
roe_data AS (
    SELECT stock_code, AVG(data) AS avg_roe
    FROM financial_ratio
    WHERE ratio_code = 'ROE' AND quarter != 0 AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    GROUP BY stock_code
)
SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, roe_data.avg_roe
FROM roe_data
JOIN total_assets ON roe_data.stock_code = total_assets.stock_code
JOIN company_info ci ON roe_data.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY roe_data.avg_roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

code_response.code:
WITH CompanyAssets AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    SUM(CASE WHEN t1.report_type = 'balance_sheet' THEN t1.data ELSE 0 END) AS total_assets
  FROM company_info AS ci
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      stock_code,
      data,
      report_type
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE
      year >= 2020 AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      stock_code,
      data,
      report_type
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE
      year >= 2020 AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      stock_code,
      data,
      report_type
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE
      year >= 2020 AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  ) AS t1
    ON ci.stock_code = t1.stock_code
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      category_code,
      en_caption,
      report_type
    FROM map_category_code_bank
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      category_code,
      en_caption,
      report_type
    FROM map_category_code_non_bank
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      category_code,
      en_caption,
      report_type
    FROM map_category_code_securities
  ) AS t2
    ON t1.report_type = t2.report_type
  WHERE
    t2.en_caption LIKE '%Total assets%'
  GROUP BY
    ci.stock_code
  HAVING
    SUM(CASE WHEN t1.report_type = 'balance_sheet' THEN t1.data ELSE 0 END) > 100000000
), CompanyROE AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    AVG(fr.data) AS avg_roe
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity' AND fr.year >= 2020 AND fr.quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    fr.stock_code
)
SELECT
  ca.stock_code,
  ca.total_assets,
  cr.avg_roe
FROM CompanyAssets AS ca
JOIN CompanyROE AS cr
  ON ca.stock_code = cr.stock_code
ORDER BY
  cr.avg_roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: What are the top 5 companies with the highest Total Assets as of December 31, 2023?

-- Step 1: Identify the category codes for "Total Assets"
-- For banks, the category code is BS_300
-- For non-bank corporations, the category code is BS_270
-- For securities firms, the category code is BS_270

SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, ci.issue_share, total_assets

    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
) AS combined_reports
JOIN company_info ci ON combined_reports.stock_code = ci.stock_code
ORDER BY total_assets DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Rank the top 5 companies with the highest Return on Equity (ROE) among  Vietcombank, Techcombank, ACB, BIDV, and VietinBank for the period from 2020 to Q2 2024,  filtering for companies with total assets exceeding 100 billion VND in each year.

code.code:
WITH TotalAssets AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code, 
        year, 
        SUM(data) AS total_assets
    FROM 
        bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        category_code = 'BS_300' -- Total assets for banks
        AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND (quarter = 0 OR (year = 2024 AND quarter = 2))
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
    HAVING 
        SUM(data) > 100000 -- 100 billion VND
),
ROEData AS (
    SELECT 
        fr.stock_code, 
        fr.year, 
        fr.quarter, 
        fr.data AS roe
    FROM 
        financial_ratio fr
    JOIN 
        map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
    WHERE 
        mccr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
        AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB', 'BID', 'CTG')
        AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND (fr.quarter = 0 OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter = 2))
)
SELECT 
    roe.stock_code, 
    roe.year, 
    roe.quarter, 
    roe.roe
FROM 
    ROEData roe
JOIN 
    TotalAssets ta ON roe.stock_code = ta.stock_code AND roe.year = ta.year
ORDER BY 
    roe.roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

| ACB          | Asia Commercial Joint Stock Bank                         | 0.226122 |   2023 |         0 |

WITH RankedROE AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.en_company_name,
    fr.data AS roe,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN financial_ratio AS fr
    ON ci.stock_code = fr.stock_code
  WHERE
    fr.ratio_code = 'ROE'
    AND ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB', 'BID', 'CTG')
    AND fr.year >= 2020
    AND fr.year <= 2024
    AND fr.quarter <= 2
  ),
  TotalAssets AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    b.data as total_assets,
    b.year,
    b.quarter
  FROM company_info ci
  JOIN bank_financial_report b
    ON ci.stock_code = b.stock_code
  WHERE
    b.category_code = 'BS_300'
    AND ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB', 'BID', 'CTG')
    AND b.year >= 2020
    AND b.year <= 2024
    AND b.quarter <=2

  )
SELECT
  r.stock_code,
  r.en_company_name,
  r.roe,
  r.year,
  r.quarter
FROM RankedROE r
JOIN TotalAssets ta
ON r.stock_code = ta.stock_code AND r.year = ta.year AND r.quarter = ta.quarter
WHERE
  ta.total_assets > 100000
ORDER BY
  r.roe DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Rank the top 5 companies with the highest operating cash flow in Q2 2024, filtering for companies with total assets exceeding 100 billion VND.
answer:
Table 1
| stock_code   | industry           |   operating_cash_flow |
|:-------------|:-------------------|----------------------:|
| MWG          | Retail             |           7.46094e+06 |
| VGI          | Telecommunications |           6.99246e+06 |
| VHM          | Real Estate        |           6.47431e+06 |
| VND          | Financial Services |           3.45256e+06 |
| SSI          | Financial Services |           3.20662e+06 |

code.code:
WITH TotalAssets AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_300' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS total_assets
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'BS_270' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
),
OperatingCashFlow AS (
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_009' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_020' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
    UNION ALL
    SELECT stock_code, data AS operating_cash_flow
    FROM securities_financial_report
    WHERE category_code = 'CF_060' AND year = 2024 AND quarter = 2
)
SELECT ci.stock_code, ci.industry, ocf.operating_cash_flow
FROM OperatingCashFlow ocf
JOIN TotalAssets ta ON ocf.stock_code = ta.stock_code
JOIN company_info ci ON ocf.stock_code = ci.stock_code
WHERE ta.total_assets > 100000
ORDER BY ocf.operating_cash_flow DESC
LIMIT 5;

code_response.code:
WITH RankedCompanies AS (
  SELECT
    nbfr.stock_code,
    nbfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
  FROM non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb
    ON nbfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
  WHERE
    mccnb.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities'
    AND nbfr.quarter = 2
    AND nbfr.year = 2024
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    bfr.stock_code,
    bfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
  FROM bank_financial_report AS bfr
  JOIN map_category_code_bank AS mccb
    ON bfr.category_code = mccb.category_code
  WHERE
    mccb.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities before changes in assets and working capital'
    AND bfr.quarter = 2
    AND bfr.year = 2024
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    sfr.stock_code,
    sfr.data AS operating_cash_flow
  FROM securities_financial_report AS sfr
  JOIN map_category_code_securities AS mccs
    ON sfr.category_code = mccs.category_code
  WHERE
    mccs.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities'
    AND sfr.quarter = 2
    AND sfr.year = 2024
), AssetCompanies AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.stock_code
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN (
    SELECT
      nbfr.stock_code,
      SUM(nbfr.data) AS total_assets
    FROM non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
    JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb
      ON nbfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
    WHERE
      mccnb.en_caption = 'TOTAL ASSETS'
      AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    GROUP BY
      nbfr.stock_code
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      bfr.stock_code,
      SUM(bfr.data) AS total_assets
    FROM bank_financial_report AS bfr
    JOIN map_category_code_bank AS mccb
      ON bfr.category_code = mccb.category_code
    WHERE
      mccb.en_caption = 'Total assets'
      AND bfr.quarter = 0
    GROUP BY
      bfr.stock_code
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      sfr.stock_code,
      SUM(sfr.data) AS total_assets
    FROM securities_financial_report AS sfr
    JOIN map_category_code_securities AS mccs
      ON sfr.category_code = mccs.category_code
    WHERE
      mccs.en_caption = 'TOTAL ASSETS'
      AND sfr.quarter = 0
    GROUP BY
      sfr.stock_code
  ) AS total_assets_table
    ON ci.stock_code = total_assets_table.stock_code
  WHERE
    total_assets > 100000
)
SELECT
  rc.stock_code,
  rc.operating_cash_flow
FROM RankedCompanies AS rc
JOIN AssetCompanies AS ac
  ON rc.stock_code = ac.stock_code
ORDER BY
  rc.operating_cash_flow DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: What is the Return on Equity (ROE) and Debt-to-Equity Ratio for Vinamilk and Masan Group for the fiscal year 2023, and how do these compare to their respective figures in 2020?  Analyze the change in these ratios over time for each company, considering the impact of both profitability and financial leverage.

code.code:
SELECT 
    stock_code, 
    year, 
    ratio_code, 
    data AS ratio_value
FROM 
    financial_ratio
WHERE 
    stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN') AND
    ratio_code IN ('ROE', 'DTER') AND
    year IN (2023, 2020) AND
    quarter = 0
ORDER BY 
    stock_code, 
    ratio_code, 
    year;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  ci.en_company_name,
  fr2023.data AS roe_2023,
  dter2023.data AS dter_2023,
  fr2020.data AS roe_2020,
  dter2020.data AS dter_2020
FROM company_info AS ci
JOIN (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM financial_ratio
  WHERE
    ratio_code = 'ROE' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
) AS fr2023
  ON ci.stock_code = fr2023.stock_code
JOIN (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM financial_ratio
  WHERE
    ratio_code = 'DTER' AND year = 2023 AND quarter = 0
) AS dter2023
  ON ci.stock_code = dter2023.stock_code
JOIN (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM financial_ratio
  WHERE
    ratio_code = 'ROE' AND year = 2020 AND quarter = 0
) AS fr2020
  ON ci.stock_code = fr2020.stock_code
JOIN (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    data
  FROM financial_ratio
  WHERE
    ratio_code = 'DTER' AND year = 2020 AND quarter = 0
) AS dter2020
  ON ci.stock_code = dter2020.stock_code
WHERE
  ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN')
LIMIT 2;

question: What was the average Return on Equity (ROE) for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and VPBank in Q2 2024, and how does this compare to their respective average ROE for the same quarter in 2020, considering their investments in subsidiaries?

code.code:
WITH bank_and_subsidiaries AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT f.stock_code, f.year, f.quarter, f.data
    FROM financial_ratio f
    JOIN map_category_code_ratio m ON f.ratio_code = m.ratio_code
    LEFT JOIN sub_and_shareholder s ON f.stock_code = s.stock_code OR f.stock_code = s.invest_on
    WHERE m.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
      AND f.quarter = 2
      AND f.year IN (2020, 2024)
      AND (f.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB') OR s.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB'))
)
SELECT stock_code, year, AVG(data) AS average_roe
FROM bank_and_subsidiaries
GROUP BY stock_code, year
ORDER BY stock_code, year;

code_response.code:
WITH ROE_Q2_2024 AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.data AS roe_2024
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
    AND fr.quarter = 2
    AND fr.year = 2024
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
), ROE_Q2_2020 AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.data AS roe_2020
  FROM financial_ratio AS fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    mcr.ratio_name = 'Return On Equity'
    AND fr.quarter = 2
    AND fr.year = 2020
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
)
SELECT
  rq24.stock_code,
  AVG(rq24.roe_2024) AS avg_roe_2024,
  AVG(rq20.roe_2020) AS avg_roe_2020
FROM ROE_Q2_2024 AS rq24
JOIN ROE_Q2_2020 AS rq20
  ON rq24.stock_code = rq20.stock_code
GROUP BY
  rq24.stock_code;

question: For the year 2023, what was the Debt-to-Equity ratio for VinGroup,  and how does this ratio change when considering the consolidated financial statements including its subsidiaries' debt and equity?

code.code:
-- Step 1: Retrieve the Debt-to-Equity ratio for VinGroup for the year 2023
SELECT fr.data AS standalone_dter
FROM financial_ratio fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE fr.stock_code = 'VIC'
  AND fr.year = 2023
  AND fr.quarter = 0
  AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio';

-- Step 2: Identify the subsidiaries of VinGroup
WITH subsidiaries AS (
    SELECT invest_on
    FROM sub_and_shareholder
    WHERE stock_code = 'VIC'
)

-- Step 3: Retrieve debt and equity data for VinGroup and its subsidiaries
, debt_equity_data AS (
    SELECT stock_code,
           SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_400' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_liabilities,
           SUM(CASE WHEN category_code IN ('BS_400', 'BS_410', 'BS_420') THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS total_equity
    FROM non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE (stock_code = 'VIC' OR stock_code IN (SELECT invest_on FROM subsidiaries))
      AND year = 2023
      AND quarter = 0
    GROUP BY stock_code
)

-- Step 4: Calculate the consolidated Debt-to-Equity ratio
, consolidated_dter AS (
    SELECT SUM(total_liabilities) / NULLIF(SUM(total_equity), 0) AS consolidated_dter
    FROM debt_equity_data
)

-- Step 5: Combine results
SELECT standalone_dter, consolidated_dter
FROM (
    SELECT fr.data AS standalone_dter
    FROM financial_ratio fr
    JOIN map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
    WHERE fr.stock_code = 'VIC'
      AND fr.year = 2023
      AND fr.quarter = 0
      AND mccr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
) AS standalone,
consolidated_dter;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  T1.data AS vic_debt_to_equity,
  T2.data AS consolidated_debt_to_equity
FROM financial_ratio AS T1
JOIN financial_ratio AS T2
  ON T1.stock_code = 'VIC'
  AND T2.stock_code = 'VIC'
  AND T1.year = 2023
  AND T2.year = 2023
  AND T1.quarter = 0
  AND T2.quarter = 0
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS T3
  ON T1.ratio_code = T3.ratio_code
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS T4
  ON T2.ratio_code = T4.ratio_code
WHERE
  T3.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'
  AND T4.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio'; -- This query assumes that a consolidated Debt-to-Equity ratio exists for VIC in the financial_ratio table.  If not, a more complex query involving joining with subsidiary data and calculating the ratio would be needed.  The database schema does not provide a clear way to identify consolidated financial statements.

question: What is the trend of the current ratio for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and Sacombank from 2020 to Q2 2024?

code.code:
SELECT 
    year, 
    quarter, 
    stock_code, 
    data AS current_ratio
FROM 
    financial_ratio
WHERE 
    ratio_code = 'CurrentR'
    AND stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'STB')
    AND (
        (year = 2020 AND quarter = 0) OR
        (year = 2021 AND quarter = 0) OR
        (year = 2022 AND quarter = 0) OR
        (year = 2023 AND quarter = 0) OR
        (year = 2024 AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2))
    )
ORDER BY 
    year, 
    quarter, 
    stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH CurrentAssets AS (
  SELECT
    br.stock_code,
    br.year,
    br.quarter,
    br.data AS current_assets
  FROM bank_financial_report AS br
  JOIN map_category_code_bank AS mcb
    ON br.category_code = mcb.category_code
  WHERE
    mcb.en_caption IN ('Current assets', 'A. CURRENT ASSETS')
    AND br.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'STB')
), CurrentLiabilities AS (
  SELECT
    br.stock_code,
    br.year,
    br.quarter,
    br.data AS current_liabilities
  FROM bank_financial_report AS br
  JOIN map_category_code_bank AS mcb
    ON br.category_code = mcb.category_code
  WHERE
    mcb.en_caption IN ('Current liabilities', 'I. Current liabilities')
    AND br.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'STB')
)
SELECT
  ca.stock_code,
  ca.year,
  ca.quarter,
  (
    ca.current_assets / cl.current_liabilities
  ) AS current_ratio
FROM CurrentAssets AS ca
JOIN CurrentLiabilities AS cl
  ON ca.stock_code = cl.stock_code
  AND ca.year = cl.year
  AND ca.quarter = cl.quarter
WHERE
  ca.year >= 2020
  AND (
    ca.year < 2024
    OR (
      ca.year = 2024
      AND ca.quarter <= 2
    )
  )
ORDER BY
  ca.year,
  ca.quarter;

question: For the period 2020-Q2 2024, provide the year-over-year change in cash and cash equivalents, and short-term borrowings for Mobile World Investment, Vinamilk, and PetroVietnam Gas.  Calculate the cash ratio for each company for each year.

code.code:
WITH cash_data AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_110' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS cash_and_cash_equivalents,
        SUM(CASE WHEN category_code = 'BS_320' THEN data ELSE 0 END) AS short_term_borrowings
    FROM 
        non_bank_financial_report
    WHERE 
        stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'GAS') 
        AND year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
        AND quarter = 0
    GROUP BY 
        stock_code, year
),
year_over_year_change AS (
    SELECT 
        a.stock_code,
        a.year,
        (a.cash_and_cash_equivalents - b.cash_and_cash_equivalents) / NULLIF(b.cash_and_cash_equivalents, 0) * 100 AS yoy_change_cash,
        (a.short_term_borrowings - b.short_term_borrowings) / NULLIF(b.short_term_borrowings, 0) * 100 AS yoy_change_borrowings
    FROM 
        cash_data a
    LEFT JOIN 
        cash_data b ON a.stock_code = b.stock_code AND a.year = b.year + 1
),
cash_ratio AS (
    SELECT 
        stock_code,
        year,
        cash_and_cash_equivalents / NULLIF(short_term_borrowings, 0) AS cash_ratio
    FROM 
        cash_data
)
SELECT 
    y.stock_code,
    y.year,
    y.yoy_change_cash,
    y.yoy_change_borrowings,
    c.cash_ratio
FROM 
    year_over_year_change y
JOIN 
    cash_ratio c ON y.stock_code = c.stock_code AND y.year = c.year
ORDER BY 
    y.stock_code, y.year;

code_response.code:
WITH YearlyCashData AS (
  SELECT
    nbfr.stock_code,
    nbfr.year,
    SUM(CASE WHEN nbfr.category_code = 'BS_111' THEN nbfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS cash_and_equivalents,
    SUM(CASE WHEN nbfr.category_code = 'BS_112' THEN nbfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS short_term_borrowings
  FROM non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
  WHERE
    nbfr.stock_code IN ('MWG', 'VNM', 'GAS')
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND nbfr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
  GROUP BY
    nbfr.stock_code,
    nbfr.year
), YearlyCashRatio AS (
  SELECT
    yc.stock_code,
    yc.year,
    (
      yc.cash_and_equivalents / NULLIF(yc.short_term_borrowings, 0)
    ) AS cash_ratio
  FROM YearlyCashData AS yc
)
SELECT
  yc.stock_code,
  yc.year,
  yc.cash_and_equivalents,
  yc.short_term_borrowings,
  yc.cash_ratio,
  LAG(yc.cash_and_equivalents, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY yc.stock_code ORDER BY yc.year) AS previous_year_cash,
  LAG(yc.short_term_borrowings, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY yc.stock_code ORDER BY yc.year) AS previous_year_borrowings,
  (
    yc.cash_and_equivalents - LAG(yc.cash_and_equivalents, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY yc.stock_code ORDER BY yc.year)
  ) AS yoy_change_cash,
  (
    yc.short_term_borrowings - LAG(yc.short_term_borrowings, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY yc.stock_code ORDER BY yc.year)
  ) AS yoy_change_borrowings
FROM YearlyCashData AS yc
JOIN YearlyCashRatio AS ycr
  ON yc.stock_code = ycr.stock_code AND yc.year = ycr.year
ORDER BY
  yc.stock_code,
  yc.year
LIMIT 100;

question: What were the operating cash flows and capital expenditures for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and VPBank in Q2 2024?  Calculate the free cash flow for each bank.

code.code:
SELECT 
    bfr.stock_code,
    bfr.year,
    bfr.quarter,
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'CF_009' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS operating_cash_flow,
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'CF_025' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS capital_expenditures,
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'CF_009' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) - 
    SUM(CASE WHEN bfr.category_code = 'CF_025' THEN bfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS free_cash_flow
FROM 
    bank_financial_report bfr
WHERE 
    bfr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB') AND
    bfr.year = 2024 AND
    bfr.quarter = 2 AND
    bfr.category_code IN ('CF_009', 'CF_025')
GROUP BY 
    bfr.stock_code, bfr.year, bfr.quarter;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  ci.en_company_name,
  COALESCE(op.data, 0) AS operating_cash_flow,
  COALESCE(capex.data, 0) AS capital_expenditures,
  COALESCE(op.data, 0) - COALESCE(capex.data, 0) AS free_cash_flow
FROM company_info AS ci
JOIN bank_financial_report AS op
  ON ci.stock_code = op.stock_code
JOIN map_category_code_bank AS op_map
  ON op.category_code = op_map.category_code
JOIN bank_financial_report AS capex
  ON ci.stock_code = capex.stock_code
JOIN map_category_code_bank AS capex_map
  ON capex.category_code = capex_map.category_code
WHERE
  ci.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'VPB')
  AND op.year = 2024
  AND op.quarter = 2
  AND op_map.en_caption = 'Net cash flow from operating activities'
  AND capex.year = 2024
  AND capex.quarter = 2
  AND capex_map.en_caption LIKE '%Cash outflows for purchase%'
LIMIT 3;

question: What is the trend of the Current Ratio for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB from 2020 to Q2 2024?

code.code:
SELECT 
    fr.year, 
    fr.quarter, 
    fr.stock_code, 
    fr.data AS current_ratio
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    mccr.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio'
    AND fr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
    AND ((fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR 
         (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter BETWEEN 1 AND 2))
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter;

code_response.code:
WITH CurrentAssets AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(data) AS current_assets
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    category_code IN ('BS_100', 'BS_150', 'BS_155')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), CurrentLiabilities AS (
  SELECT
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter,
    SUM(data) AS current_liabilities
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    category_code IN ('BS_310')
    AND quarter IN (0, 1, 2)
  GROUP BY
    stock_code,
    year,
    quarter
), CurrentRatio AS (
  SELECT
    ca.stock_code,
    ca.year,
    ca.quarter,
    (
      current_assets / current_liabilities
    ) AS current_ratio
  FROM CurrentAssets ca
  JOIN CurrentLiabilities cl
    ON ca.stock_code = cl.stock_code
    AND ca.year = cl.year
    AND ca.quarter = cl.quarter
)
SELECT
  cr.stock_code,
  cr.year,
  cr.quarter,
  cr.current_ratio
FROM CurrentRatio cr
WHERE
  cr.stock_code IN ('VCB', 'TCB', 'ACB')
  AND cr.year >= 2020
ORDER BY
  cr.stock_code,
  cr.year,
  cr.quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: For the year 2023, what was the total revenue, net income, and total assets of  Masan Group, Vinamilk, and  PetroVietnam Gas?  Additionally, provide the percentage of total assets attributable to subsidiaries or investments for each company.

code.code:
WITH financial_data AS (
    SELECT
        nfr.stock_code,
        SUM(CASE WHEN mcc.category_code = 'IS_010' THEN nfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS total_revenue,
        SUM(CASE WHEN mcc.category_code = 'IS_050' THEN nfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS net_income,
        SUM(CASE WHEN mcc.category_code = 'BS_270' THEN nfr.data ELSE 0 END) AS total_assets
    FROM
        non_bank_financial_report nfr
    JOIN
        map_category_code_non_bank mcc ON nfr.category_code = mcc.category_code
    WHERE
        nfr.year = 2023 AND nfr.quarter = 0 AND nfr.stock_code IN ('MSN', 'VNM', 'GAS')
    GROUP BY
        nfr.stock_code
),
investment_data AS (
    SELECT
        s.stock_code,
        SUM(nfr.data) AS investment_assets
    FROM
        sub_and_shareholder s
    JOIN
        non_bank_financial_report nfr ON s.invest_on = nfr.stock_code
    JOIN
        map_category_code_non_bank mcc ON nfr.category_code = mcc.category_code
    WHERE
        nfr.year = 2023 AND nfr.quarter = 0 AND mcc.category_code = 'BS_270'
    GROUP BY
        s.stock_code
)
SELECT
    fd.stock_code,
    fd.total_revenue,
    fd.net_income,
    fd.total_assets,
    COALESCE(id.investment_assets / NULLIF(fd.total_assets, 0) * 100, 0) AS percentage_investment_assets
FROM
    financial_data fd
LEFT JOIN
    investment_data id ON fd.stock_code = id.stock_code;

code_response.code:
WITH company_data AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    ci.company_name,
    ci.en_company_name,
    nbfr.data AS total_revenue,
    nbfr2.data AS net_income,
    nbfr3.data AS total_assets
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr
    ON ci.stock_code = nbfr.stock_code
  JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr2
    ON ci.stock_code = nbfr2.stock_code
  JOIN non_bank_financial_report AS nbfr3
    ON ci.stock_code = nbfr3.stock_code
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb
    ON nbfr.category_code = mccnb.category_code
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb2
    ON nbfr2.category_code = mccnb2.category_code
  JOIN map_category_code_non_bank AS mccnb3
    ON nbfr3.category_code = mccnb3.category_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'GAS')
    AND nbfr.year = 2023
    AND nbfr.quarter = 0
    AND mccnb.en_caption = 'Total Revenue'
    AND nbfr2.year = 2023
    AND nbfr2.quarter = 0
    AND mccnb2.en_caption = 'Net Income'
    AND nbfr3.year = 2023
    AND nbfr3.quarter = 0
    AND mccnb3.en_caption = 'Total Assets'
), subsidiary_data AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    SUM(ci2.issue_share) AS total_subsidiary_shares
  FROM company_info AS ci
  JOIN sub_and_shareholder AS sas
    ON ci.stock_code = sas.stock_code
  JOIN company_info AS ci2
    ON sas.invest_on = ci2.stock_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'GAS')
  GROUP BY
    ci.stock_code
)
SELECT
  cd.stock_code,
  cd.en_company_name,
  cd.total_revenue,
  cd.net_income,
  cd.total_assets,
  COALESCE((
    sd.total_subsidiary_shares * 100.0
  ) / cd.total_assets, 0) AS subsidiary_asset_percentage
FROM company_data AS cd
LEFT JOIN subsidiary_data AS sd
  ON cd.stock_code = sd.stock_code
LIMIT 3;

question: Compare the Return on Equity (ROE) of Vinamilk, Masan Group, and Sabeco for the fiscal year 2023.

code.code:
WITH relevant_companies AS (
    SELECT stock_code
    FROM company_info
    WHERE stock_code IN ('BID', 'EIB', 'OCB')
    UNION
    SELECT invest_on AS stock_code
    FROM sub_and_shareholder
    WHERE stock_code IN ('BID', 'EIB', 'OCB')
),
ratios AS (
    SELECT ratio_code
    FROM map_category_code_ratio
    WHERE ratio_name IN ('Current Ratio', 'Quick Ratio')
)
SELECT fr.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter, mcr.ratio_name, fr.data
FROM financial_ratio fr
JOIN ratios r ON fr.ratio_code = r.ratio_code
JOIN map_category_code_ratio mcr ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE fr.stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM relevant_companies)
AND ((fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 AND fr.quarter = 0) OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter <= 2))
ORDER BY fr.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter, mcr.ratio_name;

code_response.code:
WITH relevant_companies AS (
  SELECT stock_code
  FROM company_info
  WHERE stock_code IN ('BID', 'EIB', 'OCB')
),
company_ratios AS (
  SELECT
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    CASE
      WHEN mcr.ratio_name = 'Current Ratio' THEN fr.data
      ELSE NULL
    END AS current_ratio,
    CASE
      WHEN mcr.ratio_name = 'Quick Ratio' THEN fr.data
      ELSE NULL
    END AS quick_ratio
  FROM financial_ratio fr
  JOIN map_category_code_ratio mcr
    ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
  WHERE
    fr.stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM relevant_companies)
    AND fr.year >= 2020
    AND (fr.quarter = 0 OR fr.quarter <=2)
),
subsidiary_ratios AS (
  SELECT
    ci.stock_code,
    cr.year,
    cr.quarter,
    cr.current_ratio,
    cr.quick_ratio
  FROM company_info ci
  JOIN sub_and_shareholder ss
    ON ci.stock_code = ss.invest_on
  JOIN company_ratios cr
    ON ss.stock_code = cr.stock_code
  WHERE
    ci.stock_code IN (SELECT stock_code FROM relevant_companies)
)
SELECT
  coalesce(cr.stock_code, sr.stock_code) AS stock_code,
  cr.year,
  cr.quarter,
  coalesce(cr.current_ratio, 0) AS current_ratio,
  coalesce(cr.quick_ratio, 0) AS quick_ratio
FROM company_ratios cr
FULL OUTER JOIN subsidiary_ratios sr
  ON cr.stock_code = sr.stock_code AND cr.year = sr.year AND cr.quarter = sr.quarter
ORDER BY
  stock_code,
  year,
  quarter
LIMIT 100;

question: What was the total equity of  Vietcombank's subsidiaries and associated companies as a percentage of Vietcombank's total equity at the end of Q2 2024?

code.code:
-- Step 1: Identify Vietcombank's subsidiaries and associated companies
WITH vcb_subsidiaries AS (
    SELECT invest_on
    FROM sub_and_shareholder
    WHERE stock_code = 'VCB'
),

-- Step 2: Retrieve the total equity of these subsidiaries and associated companies
subsidiaries_equity AS (
    SELECT SUM(data) AS total_subsidiaries_equity
    FROM (
        SELECT data
        FROM bank_financial_report
        WHERE stock_code IN (SELECT invest_on FROM vcb_subsidiaries)
          AND year = 2024
          AND quarter = 2
          AND category_code = 'BS_500' -- Shareholders’ equity for banks
        UNION ALL
        SELECT data
        FROM non_bank_financial_report
        WHERE stock_code IN (SELECT invest_on FROM vcb_subsidiaries)
          AND year = 2024
          AND quarter = 2
          AND category_code = 'BS_400' -- Owner's equity for non-banks
        UNION ALL
        SELECT data
        FROM securities_financial_report
        WHERE stock_code IN (SELECT invest_on FROM vcb_subsidiaries)
          AND year = 2024
          AND quarter = 2
          AND category_code = 'BS_400' -- Owner's equity for securities
    ) AS equity_data
),

-- Step 3: Retrieve Vietcombank's total equity
vcb_equity AS (
    SELECT data AS total_vcb_equity
    FROM bank_financial_report
    WHERE stock_code = 'VCB'
      AND year = 2024
      AND quarter = 2
      AND category_code = 'BS_500' -- Shareholders’ equity for banks
)

-- Step 4: Calculate the percentage
SELECT (subsidiaries_equity.total_subsidiaries_equity / vcb_equity.total_vcb_equity) * 100 AS equity_percentage
FROM subsidiaries_equity, vcb_equity;

code_response.code:
WITH VietcombankEquity AS (
  SELECT
    data AS vcb_equity
  FROM bank_financial_report
  WHERE
    stock_code = 'VCB'
    AND year = 2024
    AND quarter = 2
    AND category_code = 'BS_500'
), SubsidiaryEquity AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(bfr.data) AS total_subsidiary_equity
  FROM bank_financial_report AS bfr
  JOIN sub_and_shareholder AS sas
    ON bfr.stock_code = sas.invest_on
  WHERE
    sas.stock_code = 'VCB'
    AND bfr.year = 2024
    AND bfr.quarter = 2
    AND bfr.category_code IN ('BS_211', 'BS_213')
)
SELECT
  (
    total_subsidiary_equity * 100.0 / vcb_equity
  ) AS percentage_of_vcb_equity
FROM VietcombankEquity,
  SubsidiaryEquity;

question: How has the Debt-to-Equity ratio of Vinamilk, Masan Group, and SABECO changed from 2020 to Q2 2024?  Compare their respective Quick Ratios over the same period.

code.code:
SELECT 
    fr.stock_code,
    fr.year,
    fr.quarter,
    fr.ratio_code,
    fr.data
FROM 
    financial_ratio fr
JOIN 
    map_category_code_ratio mccr ON fr.ratio_code = mccr.ratio_code
WHERE 
    fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
    AND fr.year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024
    AND (fr.quarter = 0 OR fr.quarter = 2) -- Include annual reports and Q2 reports
    AND mccr.ratio_code IN ('DTER', 'QR') -- Debt-to-Equity Ratio and Quick Ratio
ORDER BY 
    fr.stock_code, fr.year, fr.quarter, fr.ratio_code;

code_response.code:
SELECT
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  CASE
    WHEN fr.stock_code = 'VNM' THEN 'Vinamilk'
    WHEN fr.stock_code = 'MSN' THEN 'Masan Group'
    WHEN fr.stock_code = 'SAB' THEN 'SABECO'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END AS company_name,
  MAX(CASE WHEN mcr.ratio_name = 'Debt To Equity Ratio' THEN fr.data ELSE NULL END) AS "Debt-to-Equity Ratio",
  MAX(CASE WHEN mcr.ratio_name = 'Quick Ratio' THEN fr.data ELSE NULL END) AS "Quick Ratio"
FROM financial_ratio AS fr
JOIN map_category_code_ratio AS mcr
  ON fr.ratio_code = mcr.ratio_code
WHERE
  fr.stock_code IN ('VNM', 'MSN', 'SAB')
  AND fr.year >= 2020
  AND (fr.year < 2024 OR (fr.year = 2024 AND fr.quarter <= 2))
GROUP BY
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter,
  company_name
ORDER BY
  fr.year,
  fr.quarter;
